tb_mod_ena
module tb_mod_ena #(
parameter 
CLOCK_SPEED
 = 
2000000,
parameter 
START_AT_ZERO
 = 
0,
parameter 
DELAY
 = 
0
)()

mod clock enable test bench

Parameters
CLOCK_SPEED
parameter

Clock speed

START_AT_ZERO
parameter

Set to 1 to enable start at zero.

DELAY
parameter

Set to the number of clock cycles to delay the enable output signal.
